title: Spacious 3 Bedroom 2 Bathroom with Patio-Call Now!
posting_body: ['Nestled in the heart of Norwalk, Capistrano Gardens is a beautiful gated community where contemporary apartment living meets a modern lifestyle!', "Centrally located near all of Norwalk's best dining and local hot spots, life at Capistrano Gardens never gets dull!", 'Capistrano Gardens is just a few minutes from the Cerritos Performing Arts Center, the Norwalk Civic Center, Biola University, Cora Hargitt Middle School Academy, and John Glenn High School.', 'Capistrano Gardens is next door to the Newly Renovated Don Knabe Golf Center & Junior Academy.', 'You will find all the comfort, charm, and conveniences of home at Capistrano Gardens.', 'Enjoy a full work-out in our fitness center which features cardiovascular machines and weight lifting equipment.', 'Soak up the sun on our beautiful deck and take a dip in one of our sparkling pools, relax in our soothing spa or entertain your friends in the outdoor barbeque area.', 'We invite you to tour our contemporary community today.', 'Capistrano Gardens is professionally managed by Cirrus Asset Management, Inc. <URL>)', 'Our leasing professionals welcome the opportunity to show you a charming home that is sure to fit your needs!', '*prices are subjected to change', '-Air Conditioning', '-Laundry Facility', '-Newly Renovated & Upgraded Interiors', '-Off', 'Street Parking', '-Heat Included', '-On-Site
